T02TD2646E:270a-1: pra tishtha bi dhi sam kshipta /
T02TD2646E:270a-3: rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2646E:270a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2646E:270a-5: 'jam dbyangs chen po'i yon tan ni //
T02TD2646E:270a-6: rin chen 'od kyis brgyan pa la //
T02TD2646E:270a-7: btud nas rab gnas cho ga ni //
T02TD2646E:270a-8: lhag par 'dir bsdus brjod par bya //
T02TD2646E:270a-11: / dri med mkha' 'dra'i sku mnga' zhing //
T02TD2646E:270a-12: brjod du med pa de dag la //
T02TD2646E:270a-13: rab gnas 'thad pa ma yin te //
T02TD2646E:270a-14: de dag sku ni kun rdzogs pa //
T02TD2646E:270a-15: brtse bzang ro las byung ba ltar //
T02TD2646E:270a-16: de la brten nas dge ba ni //
T02TD2646E:270a-17: mtha' yas ster te 'thad pa'ang min //
T02TD2646E:270a-18: rnal 'byor de nyid shes skyon bcom //
T02TD2646E:270a-19: brtse ba'i rang bzhin rigs su skyes //
T02TD2646E:270a-20: mdangs ldan bsgom pa shes rab can //
T02TD2646E:270a-21: kun la mkhas shing dad pa yis //
T02TD2646E:270a-22: chu klung chu dag btab pa yis //
T02TD2646E:270a-23: sems sbyangs mchog ni slob dpon yin //
T02TD2646E:270a-24: bdag kun slob dpon la phul ba //
T02TD2646E:270a-25: slob ma de ni legs rnams bzhi //
T02TD2646E:270a-26: sku gzugs dang ni mchod rten dang //
T02TD2646E:270a-27: dam chos gtsug lag khang legs bzhes //
T02TD2646E:270a-28: nye bar 'tshe kun sel ba rnams //
T02TD2646E:270a-29: 'dir ni bla mas rab gnas bya //
T02TD2646E:270a-30: gang zhig 'jim pa rngo dngul dang //
T02TD2646E:270a-31: ra gan gser dang shing bzangs las //
T02TD2646E:270a-32: rgyal ba rgyal ba'i ngang tshul mnga' ba'i sku gzugs byed pa de //
T02TD2646E:270a-33: yun ring dus su sa bdag bde longs spyad nas tha mar ni //
T02TD2646E:270a-34: skyob pa'i go 'phang mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD2646E:270a-35: gang na sku gzugs bzhengs zin cing //
T02TD2646E:270a-36: yun rings ma mchod bzhugs bder //
T02TD2646E:270a-38: bla mas thog mar cha rkyen kun //
T02TD2646E:270a-39: ji ltar rnyed bzhin rab bzung nas //
T02TD2646E:270a-40: gos rgyan bdug pa la sogs pas //
T02TD2646E:270a-41: rnam bkra mchod pa'i khang par ni //
T02TD2646E:270b-0: @270b zhag bzang po la cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2646E:270b-1: dkyil 'khor dag la bri bar bya //
T02TD2646E:270b-2: bgegs bsal nas ni der sngags kyis //
T02TD2646E:270b-3: mgul rgyan rin chen shing tog la //
T02TD2646E:270b-4: sogs dang kha brgyan me tog gis //
T02TD2646E:270b-5: mtshan ba'i bum pa lhag gnas bya //
T02TD2646E:270b-6: sku gzugs la sogs pa dag la //
T02TD2646E:270b-7: bsang gtor dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2646E:270b-8: phyi nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2646E:270b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa rnams la mchod pa rnam la lngas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2646E:270b-10: spos snod thogs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2646E:270b-11: sku gzugs sngon du phyogs byas te //
T02TD2646E:270b-12: rdo rje dril bzang legs bzung zhing //
T02TD2646E:270b-13: lus bsgoms gyur pas gus par ni //
T02TD2646E:270b-14: snyan gsan dbab pa'i tshigs bcad gdon //
T02TD2646E:270b-15: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje bzang //
T02TD2646E:270b-16: rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2646E:270b-17: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2646E:270b-18: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2646E:270b-19: khyod la mchod pa bgyid slad du //
T02TD2646E:270b-20: bdag ni rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2646E:270b-21: de phyir gus pas bdag la ni //
T02TD2646E:270b-22: bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad par 'os //
T02TD2646E:270b-23: 'jig rten mgon po thugs rje can //
T02TD2646E:270b-24: sangs rgyas dgra bcom byang chub sems //
T02TD2646E:270b-25: gsang sngags lha gzhan gang dag dang //
T02TD2646E:270b-26: lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang //
T02TD2646E:270b-28: bstan la mngon par dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2646E:270b-29: gang dag la la lha mig dang //
T02TD2646E:270b-30: ldan pa thams cad bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2646E:270b-31: rdo rje can dag che ge mo //
T02TD2646E:270b-32: ci nus par ni mchod pa yis //
T02TD2646E:270b-33: rig ba'i rgyal bo'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2646E:270b-34: rab tu gnas pa bgyid pa lags //
T02TD2646E:270b-35: de phyir thams cad slob ma dang //
T02TD2646E:270b-36: bcas pa bdag la brtser dgongs te //
T02TD2646E:270b-37: rab tu gnas pa 'di la ni //
T02TD2646E:270b-38: nye ba nyid du mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD2646E:270b-39: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2646E:270b-40: rdzogs sangs rgyas kun dga' ldan dang //
T02TD2646E:270b-41: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums na ni //
T02TD2646E:270b-42: ji ltar rab tu zhugs de bzhin //
T02TD2646E:270b-43: sku gzugs 'di la bzhugs su gsol//
T02TD2646E:270b-44: che ge mo yi don dang ni //
T02TD2646E:270b-45: byang chub sems rab bskyed slad du //
T02TD2646E:270b-46: mgon po rtag tu 'dir bzhugs nas //
T02TD2646E:270b-47: me tog la sogs 'di rnams bzhes //
T02TD2646E:270b-49: gus pas snyan gsan gdab par bya'o /
T02TD2646E:270b-51: // / slob dpon gnyis su med pa yi //
T02TD2646E:270b-52: sbyor ba dang ldan mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2646E:271a-1: ma gso sbyong bcas pa la //
T02TD2646E:271a-2: sku khrus gsol bya bgegs gzhil dang //
T02TD2646E:271a-3: sa bon zla ba mtshan la sogs //
T02TD2646E:271a-4: bsgom dang ye shes sems sku gzugs //
T02TD2646E:271a-5: dgod dang na bza' ser po yis //
T02TD2646E:271a-6: g-yogs dang gtor ma'i las rgyas pa //
T02TD2646E:271a-7: byas te de nas brjod par bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-8: yi ge brgya ba lan gsum gdon //
T02TD2646E:271a-9: aom h'um hr'i zhes bya sngags kyis //
T02TD2646E:271a-10: gtsug lag khang ni lhag gnas bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-11: yi ge bhr'um gyis rnam snang las byung ba'i //
T02TD2646E:271a-12: mchod rten dam chos glegs bam rgyal yum ma ma //
T02TD2646E:271a-13: de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rnams bsams nas //
T02TD2646E:271a-14: legs par gnas pa bdag ni 'dra bar bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-15: rmi lam dag dang mchod yang ;
T02TD2646E:271a-16: / gus pas slob ma byed du gzhug / ji skad bshad pa'i so shing ni //
T02TD2646E:271a-17: lan bdun sngags pa sbyin par bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-18: aom sarba b'a pam da ha na badzra ya aa sya sarba p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:271a-20: aom badzra h'um zhes ba'i sngags kyis de la chu khyor ba gsum yang sbyin no //
T02TD2646E:271a-21: lag g-yon srad bu dang bcas shing //
T02TD2646E:271a-22: dag pa'i mal la gnas byas te //
T02TD2646E:271a-23: de la bla mas rmi lam gyi //
T02TD2646E:271a-24: mtshan ma rnams ni bstan par bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-27: // / de nas rab gnas nyin par rnal 'byor can //
T02TD2646E:271a-28: rgyun du byas pa'i las ni yang dag bsgrub //
T02TD2646E:271a-29: mchod phyir thogs dang ldan zhing dar dpyangs bcings //
T02TD2646E:271a-30: lag pa g-yas pa gser gyi sor gdub mtshan //
T02TD2646E:271a-31: legs par khrus byas lus dri zhim //
T02TD2646E:271a-32: gtsang mar gyur pa'i bgo ba bgos //
T02TD2646E:271a-33: byams dang snying rje rjes su 'brel //
T02TD2646E:271a-34: rtag sngags bsam gtan lhur len des //
T02TD2646E:271a-35: mchod khang phyogs ni rgyas pa yis //
T02TD2646E:271a-36: mdzes par yid du 'ong ba yi //
T02TD2646E:271a-37: stan la 'dug ste bsrung ba yi //
T02TD2646E:271a-38: 'khor los phyogs sogs bgegs med bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-39: bum pa rnams ni byin brlabs dang //
T02TD2646E:271a-40: dkyil 'khor man ngag bsgoms pa dang //
T02TD2646E:271a-41: mchod pa byas nas sngags rnams kyi //
T02TD2646E:271a-42: mda' sogs mdzes par dgod par bya //
T02TD2646E:271a-44: tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa yis //
T02TD2646E:271a-45: yongs su dkri bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2646E:271a-46: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2646E:271a-47: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta di sham bandha h'um /
T02TD2646E:271a-49: bgegs zhi byas nas na bza' ser //
T02TD2646E:271a-50: gsal byed de nas mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2646E:271a-51: cho ga bzhin du sku khrus gsol //
T02TD2646E:271a-52: gang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2646E:271b-0: @271b rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
T02TD2646E:271b-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha los sgyur ba /
T02TD2646E:271b-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
T02TD2646E:271b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sku khrus 'di dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2646E:271b-7: de bzhin du gang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bas kyang ngo ;
T02TD2646E:271b-8: / yon tan dam pa sku mnga' zhing //
T02TD2646E:271b-9: lha dang mi yis mchod 'os pa //
T02TD2646E:271b-10: sku byad lta bas mi chog la //
T02TD2646E:271b-11: bdag gis sku khrus gsol bar bgyi //
T02TD2646E:271b-12: mchod rten rin chen chos sku'i bdag / yon tan dam pa'i gzugs brnyan ni //
T02TD2646E:271b-13: bdag gis dang pas sku khrus gsol //
T02TD2646E:271b-14: bud med gzugs kyis 'dul rnams la //
T02TD2646E:271b-15: thugs rjes rgyal ba'i sku gzugs pa //
T02TD2646E:271b-16: lha yi rnam pa de la ni //
T02TD2646E:271b-17: bdag gis sku khrus gsol bar bgyi //
T02TD2646E:271b-18: slob pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gnas //
T02TD2646E:271b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs bzhi //
T02TD2646E:271b-20: gtsug lag khang 'di bdag gis ni //
T02TD2646E:271b-21: dad pas khrus 'di dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD2646E:271b-22: bdag gis rab tu gnas par bgyi //
T02TD2646E:271b-23: zhes thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2646E:271b-24: gang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa /
T02TD2646E:271b-25: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2646E:271b-26: dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus sku mdzes pa /
T02TD2646E:271b-27: lta bas chog mi shes pa ;
T02TD2646E:271b-30: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rab tu gnas par bgyi'o //
T02TD2646E:271b-31: thugs rje che zhing zhi ba ste //
T02TD2646E:271b-32: dul zhing bsam gtan go 'phang gnas //
T02TD2646E:271b-33: thugs kar gnas pa'i gsang sngags ni //
T02TD2646E:271b-34: thugs su chud phyir sangs rgyas zhes //
T02TD2646E:271b-35: de yi mtshan can de ltar 'gyur //
T02TD2646E:271b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD2646E:271b-37: sku gzugs 'di la spyan drang bgyi //
T02TD2646E:271b-38: zhes bya 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku //
T02TD2646E:271b-39: shin tu 'od gsal bkug byas te //
T02TD2646E:271b-40: sku gzugs la ni bzhugs par bya //
T02TD2646E:271b-42: na mo bha ga ba te ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te sam mya ka sam buddh'a ya /
T02TD2646E:271b-44: aom mu ne mu ne ma h'a mu ne ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:271b-46: tshigs su bcad pa gi wang gis bris te /
T02TD2646E:271b-47: de bzhin bsod nams mtha' yas gdung bkrus nas //
T02TD2646E:271b-48: gdan khri la sogs nang du gzhug byas la /
T02TD2646E:271b-49: sngags kyi rdo rje'i zhal mang bya'o //
T02TD2646E:271b-50: de la tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2646E:272a-0: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he @272a * //
T02TD2646E:272a-1: tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba da ta /
T02TD2646E:272a-2: tesh'a nytsa yo ni ro dha /
T02TD2646E:272a-3: ae bam w'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
T02TD2646E:272a-5: gzhan la rang rang snying po ni //
T02TD2646E:272a-6: yang dag bris te gzhug par bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-7: sngags gzhug pa dang rdo rje zhal gyi sngags ni /
T02TD2646E:272a-8: aom dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:272a-10: aom badzra dh'a tu garbha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:272a-12: rol cha rnam pa sna tshogs dkrol bas rgyas pa'i glu rgyun gyis /
T02TD2646E:272a-13: gsal bar snying rgyas sim pas bud med rnams kyi gar dang ni //
T02TD2646E:272a-14: bkra shis sgra ni rnam par bde ba ster ba byung ba'i tshe //
T02TD2646E:272a-15: sngags pas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-16: sngags pas sku khrus tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2646E:272a-17: byas nas gser gyi thur mang gis //
T02TD2646E:272a-18: lha bshos bzang po sngon btang ste //
T02TD2646E:272a-19: spyan dag bal gyis dbye bar bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-20: aom tsakshu sa manta tsakshur bi sho dha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:272a-21: aom d'i bya aan na sa m'a dhi dhy'a na pr'i na ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:272a-22: gos mchog dri zhim bkra dang nor bu ni //
T02TD2646E:272a-23: sngags kyis dag par byas rnams rab mchod nas //
T02TD2646E:272a-24: mchod pa'i sprin tshogs mang por snang spros pas ;
T02TD2646E:272a-25: / snying ga'i sa bon gnas te gsang sngags brjod /
T02TD2646E:272a-26: aom su pra tishtha ta badzra ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:272a-28: rgyal ba'i tshogs ni g-yo ba rnams //
T02TD2646E:272a-29: sku gzugs dag la bzhugs par bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-30: badzra gi ta b'a tyee: bi sa bi sa zhes bya bas /
T02TD2646E:272a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas te /
T02TD2646E:272a-32: h'um gis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2646E:272a-34: de bzhin du gtor ma dag gis tshim par byas te /
T02TD2646E:272a-37: mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
T02TD2646E:272a-39: aom h'um hr'i: bhr'um tishtha tishtha /
T02TD2646E:272a-40: de bzhin du yig 'bru aa las grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
T02TD2646E:272a-41: aom pradznye pradznye shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2646E:272a-43: dam chos glegs bam la sogs gzhan //
T02TD2646E:272a-44: gang gis rab tu gnas byas na //
T02TD2646E:272a-45: bdag po de dang de'am ni //
T02TD2646E:272a-46: yang na rdo rje 'chang dgod bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-47: de bzhin mchod rten gtsug lag khang //
T02TD2646E:272a-48: sa bon la sogs legs bsgom pa //
T02TD2646E:272a-49: sngags pas 'bad de bum pa yis //
T02TD2646E:272a-50: de bzhin rgya cher bsang bar bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-51: aom au da ka aa bhi shinytsa aom h'um hr'i:/
T02TD2646E:272a-52: de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi //
T02TD2646E:272a-53: rnam pas nag po chen po dgug / de la rgyal ba'i bka' dran bya //
T02TD2646E:272a-54: de la yun ring skyob byed 'gyur //
T02TD2646E:272a-55: kha cig las ni lus ngan la //
T02TD2646E:272a-56: gtor ma rgya chen sbyin zhes 'byung //
T02TD2646E:272b-0: @272b bhr'um kham badzra bha ba dridha tishtha bh'um kham /
T02TD2646E:272b-1: ma tshang lhag pa zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2646E:272b-2: yi ge brgya pa gus par gdon //
T02TD2646E:272b-3: cho ga bzhin du ci nus par //
T02TD2646E:272b-4: sbyin sreg gis ni las kyang bya //
T02TD2646E:272b-5: 'bras bu mtha' yas dge 'dun mchod bya zhing //
T02TD2646E:272b-6: skye bo 'phongs dang gzugs kyang ma tshang dang //
T02TD2646E:272b-7: sems can chu rgyu sa rgyu mkha' rgyu dang//
T02TD2646E:272b-8: 'gro ba dag ni yongs su tshim par bya //
T02TD2646E:272b-9: sdig med gnyen bshes dang bcas mtshan mos dga' dang //
T02TD2646E:272b-10: glu dbyangs rol mo'i sgra snyan gyis sad dga' ba yi //
T02TD2646E:272b-11: bdud rtsis sems pa'i dngos po shas che'i gar ldan zhing //
T02TD2646E:272b-12: 'khor ba'i mtshan mo zhi bar byed la gus par 'bang //
T02TD2646E:272b-13: nyi ma bdun gyi mtshan tsam gyis //
T02TD2646E:272b-14: dga' ston cher sgrub rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2646E:272b-15: mchod pas yang dag g-yeng ba yis //
T02TD2646E:272b-16: de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya //
T02TD2646E:272b-17: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang //
T02TD2646E:272b-18: gang de'i sras dang tshangs la sogs //
T02TD2646E:272b-19: lha tshogs rnams dang 'byung po gang //
T02TD2646E:272b-20: mthu bo che dang bzod pa mdzod //
T02TD2646E:272b-21: sbyin bdag la ni thams cad du //
T02TD2646E:272b-22: zhi dang bde legs cher mdzad de //
T02TD2646E:272b-23: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02TD2646E:272b-24: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2646E:272b-25: gang na bskal pa'am bskal pa las //
T02TD2646E:272b-26: lhag par sku gzugs 'di bzhugs par //
T02TD2646E:272b-27: sa dang chu dang me rlung gi / lha rnams kun gyis srung du gsol ;
T02TD2646E:272b-28: / shin tu dga' dang yid bde bar //
T02TD2646E:272b-29: gyur nas rab gnas bzang por shes //
T02TD2646E:272b-30: slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang //
T02TD2646E:272b-31: bu dang tsha bo'ang srung du gsol //
T02TD2646E:272b-32: bla mas tshul bzhin rab gnas byas pa yin //
T02TD2646E:272b-33: mchod pa byas la lung bstan sbyin par bya //
T02TD2646E:272b-34: de tshe slob mas bka' 'di 'dod 'jo yi //
T02TD2646E:272b-35: bltar rtag tu bsams te mchod las bya //
T02TD2646E:272b-36: de nas 'jigs pa dag ni myur du ldog / de nas ngan 'gro ma lus chad par 'gyur //
T02TD2646E:272b-37: de nas sngon 'dod 'bras bu rtag tu 'byin //
T02TD2646E:272b-38: de nas nam yang mjon [*mngon?] mtho 'jigs pa med //
T02TD2646E:272b-39: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dad pa'i 'byung gnas go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2646E:272b-41: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka wa rma dang /
T02TD2646E:272b-42: bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
